pkgmetadata.longdescription: Machine Learning Foundations // Offers a gentle introduction to machine learning concepts for practitioners with a statistical pedigree: decomposition of model error (bias-variance trade- off), nonlinear correlations, information theory and functional permutation/bootstrap simulations. Szkely GJ, Rizzo ML, Bakirov NK. (2007). doi:10.1214/009053607000000505. Reshef DN, Reshef YA, Finucane HK, Grossman SR, McVean G, Turnbaugh PJ, Lander ES, Mitzenmacher M, Sabeti PC. (2011). doi:10.1126/science.1205438.
